H0.text: German Baron Karl Drais's 1818 Laufmaschine (or Dandy horse/Draisine), origin of the modern bike, lacked. Brakes

H1.text: German Baron Karl Drais's 1818 Laufmaschine (or Dandy horse/Draisine), origin of the modern bike, lacked. Chain drive

H2.text: German Baron Karl Drais's 1818 Laufmaschine (or Dandy horse/Draisine), origin of the modern bike, lacked. Gears

H3.text: German Baron Karl Drais's 1818 Laufmaschine (or Dandy horse/Draisine), origin of the modern bike, lacked. Pedal-propulsion

A4.text: The dandy horse is powered by the rider's feet on the ground instead of the pedals of later bicycles.
